wordSelection.title: Word Selection
wordSelection.description: Long press on an English word to select it and add it to your vocabulary.

bookSearch.title: Look Up Post
bookSearch.description: Tap the book icon (BookSearch) below a post to select the entire post for translation or looking up meanings.

share.title: Share Feature
share.description: After selecting a word, tap the 'Share' button in the popup to share the post to Bluesky with an image. Share your learning progress with friends.
